pkgmetadata.longdescription: Congeneric Normal-Ogive Model // The congeneric normal-ogive model is a popular model for psychometric data (McDonald, R. P. (1997) doi:10.1007/978-1-4757-2691-6_15). This model estimates the model, calculates theoretical and concrete reliability coefficients, and predicts the latent variable of the model. This is the companion package to Moss (2020) doi:10.31234/osf.io/nvg5d.
